article: lugging rifles , anti-tank missiles and ##-pound rucksacks , several squads of u.s. marines landed here thursday , skimming across the beaches of kuwait in a fleet of thundering helicopters in an exercise that officers said was intended both as a show of force and as a means of tuning up fighting skills after weeks at sea .
abstract: marines stage desert exercise in show of force
